content: publisher s notes - loops & threads charisma yarn in white sold at michaels craft stores - small amount of black worsted weight yarn for the nose and to sew on the eyes - size i9 5 50mm crochet hook - tapestry needle - poly-fil stuffing for the nose - 2 small black buttons for eyes - see more at http //www repeatcrafterme com/2013/12/crochet-polar-bear-hat-pattern html#sthash afjj03ur dpuf
